name: install-cloud-sdk-build-task
author: Google Cloud Tools
description: Installs and configures the Google Cloud SDK
helpMarkDown: The [Google Cloud SDK](https://cloud.google.com/sdk) is required for all Google Cloud Tools for TFS Build tasks.

inputs.name: AllowReporting
inputs.label: Send anonymous usage statistics to Google
inputs.helpMarkDown: Help make Google Cloud SDK better by automatically sending [anonymous usage statistics](https://cloud.google.com/sdk/usage-statistics) to Google.

inputs.name: Project
inputs.label: Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: Configure the Cloud SDK's current default project. If left blank, the current configuration will not change.

inputs.name: Region
inputs.label: Region
inputs.helpMarkDown: Configure the Cloud SDK's current default compute/region. If left blank, the current configuration will not change.

inputs.name: Zone
inputs.label: Zone
inputs.helpMarkDown: Configure the Cloud SDK's current default compute/zone. If left blank, the current configuration will not change.

inputs.name: Config
inputs.label: Configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the configuration to create or activate.

inputs.name: InstallPath
inputs.label: Install Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path on the agent to install the Cloud SDK. Defaults to '%LOCALAPPDATA%\Google\Cloud SDK'

inputs.name: ForceInstall
inputs.label: Force Install
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this to force an install of the Cloud SDK even if it already exists on the path.

inputs.name: CleanInstallPath
inputs.label: Clean Install Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this to remove files from the target installation path.
